R

readBoardToString() - Method in class controller.FileEditorController
Reads the board and a builds a String following standard RLE formatting rules.
readDimension(String) - Static method in class model.FileManagement
Takes a String containing board dimension data from the loaded .rle file, isolates it and returns it as int.
readFile(Reader, String) - Static method in class model.FileManagement
Returns the data located in .rle file broken up into separate strings ready for application or further manipulation.
readFileFromDisk() - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
Reads and applies data from a local Run-Length Encoding file.
readFileFromURL() - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
Reads and applies Run-Length Encoding data from a URL.
readPatternDynamicBoard(String, int, int) - Static method in class model.FileManagement
Converts a string containing cell pattern from the loaded .rle file into a two-dimensional list that represents the cell pattern.
readPatternStaticBoard(String, int, int) - Static method in class model.FileManagement
Converts a string containing cell pattern from the loaded .rle file into a two-dimensional byte array that represents the cell pattern.
readRules(String) - Static method in class model.FileManagement
Takes a String containing rule data from the loaded .rle file, identifies birth and survival rules and returns them in lists.
resetEvent() - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
Set the board back to a previous state.
returnToMenuEvent() - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
Set menu.fxml as the scene of primaryStage.
rules(int, int) - Static method in class model.GoL
Method that determines if a cell is to live or not in the next generation of the game based on the conditions set for for birth and survival in the class' fields bornAmount and surviveAmount.
RulesEditorController - Class in controller
Controller class for rulesEditor.fxml.
RulesEditorController() - Constructor for class controller.RulesEditorController
 
rulesLabel - Variable in class controller.MainScreenController
 
run() - Method in class model.NextGenerationThread
Runs the runnable, which only does the concurrent next generation method.
